TypeSignature.Value: public ref class LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute sealed : Attribute
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute Inherits Attribute

Docs.summary: Determines whether the component participates in load balancing, if the component load balancing service is installed and enabled on the server.

remarks.format:
